overview:
Bo is responsible for sales and marketing at GlowTouch and is focused on business growth for the Application Development line of business. Bo brings a depth of experience in enterprise application sales and consulting.

Before joining GlowTouch, Bo worked in sales at Cognos, an IBM Company, as a Solutions Architect and Territory Account Manager.

Prior to this, he worked as a Management Consultant for Deloitte & Touche, LLC. Bo holds a Business Degree in Marketing from the University of Mississippi and a MBA from the University of Georgia.
